_sText:
This is de_fearmansion who is a part of the j2 Halloween Mappack 2008.
See for the full pack here:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/studios/projects/view/21038

I know this map isn't the best for gameplay at all. But the main point of this map is to scare people. So to fully experience the real purpose of this map, explore it alone at night, without other players or bots, with lights out and volume up. Then tell me if you think this map served it's purpose :)
